$37.50 for the Jeffersonian albums;
$42.50 for the others.
He therefore suggests that you go ahead and
have an agreement drawn up and sent for signature;
and just as soon as the agreement has been signed, to
go ahead and announce the price increase on behalf of
N.A.E.B. before EBF announces that we are distributing
the albums, as we do not want tc be identified with
the price increase0
We will ask our promotion and advertising
department to get together with George Probst to
sketch a brochure which will contain the announcement
of our distribution of these albums; but this brochure
will not be released until you have confirmed our
agreement by having the contract signed.
Sincerely yours,
/s/ Grace George
